properties.areaDesc: South Laramie Range Foothills; South Laramie Range
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 1 at 2:42AM MST until March 2 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne WY
properties.description:
...MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW AT TIMES WILL IMPACT AREAS ALONG AND
WEST OF THE LARAMIE RANGE SUNDAY THROUGH MONDAY MORNING...

* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8
inches.

* WHERE...The southern Laramie Range and adjacent foothills,
including the Interstate 80 Summit.

* WHEN...From 11 AM Sunday to 5 AM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Transportation may be severely impacted with snow
covered roads...drifting snow and poor visibility. Plan on
slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could
significantly reduce visibility in the higher elevations.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 AM MST MONDAY
